lead_paragraph: Britain's so-called non-dom system gives some rich people what appears to be an unfair tax break, but abolishing it could cost the country.

headline.main: A British Tax Break in Need of Fine-Tuning
headline.print_headline: A British Tax Break in Need of Fine-Tuning

snippet: Britain's so-called non-dom system gives some rich people what appears to be an unfair tax break, but abolishing it could cost the country.
